shortDescription: Full-stack adaptive learning platform that transforms PDFs, PowerPoint slides, and scanned documents into interactive quizzes using Groq Llama 3.3. Features intelligent chunking, AI-graded subjective answers with personalized feedback, weakness detection analytics, and gamified UI with 3D animations. Deployed on Vercel + Render.
